snippet: “Melt to Earth” is an installation of 14 painted aluminum sculptures on the Josie Robertson Plaza of Lincoln Center.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews outdoor sculpture installation by Aaron Curry at Josie Roberston Plaza at Lincoln Center.
